title: Detox and Balance Self Care Kit
author: Serenity Springs Salon; Spa
description: DescriptionTake 10 to detox and balance skin with this two-step selfcare facial. Step 1: Brighten, smooth and clarify with NEWPro 5 Liquid Exfoliant.Formulated with gentle alpha and poly hydroxy acids to impart an instant glow and radiance over time, this exfoliating elixir boosts the effectiveness of masks and serumsStep 2: Detox and refine with Charcoal Detox Mask. Powered by charcoal, kaolin and bentonite clay this double duty detoxing clay mask + exfoliating skin scrub resets skin for a clearer tomorrow.
